5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn ‘Umar that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“One prayer in this mosque of mine is better than one thousand prayers in any other mosque except the Sacred Mosque.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ الصَّلاَةِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ وَمَسْجِدِ النَّبِيِّ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the virtue of praying in the Sacred Mosque and the Mosque of the Prophet (ﷺ)
